7-9-98

================================================================

Model Name              : Amber

installation directory  : quake2/baseq2/players/amber

Author                  : Brian "EvilBastard" Collins

Email Address           : brian@zono.com

Website Address         : www.michaeljwolf.com/brian/quake.htm

Model description       : 

	Amber is Sydney's sister (see the resemblence...) She is like her sister in every way, except for her preferance for a variety of weapons.

Other info              : 
	I have wanted to do a 'full' vwep model for a while, i thought i would start by converting on of my old ones.

Additional Credits to   : 
	* Idsoftware 
	* Q2modeler


Thanks to               :

	Bodyshop messageboard regulars - You guys kick ass.

================================================================

* Play Information *

New Sounds              : NO

CTF Skins               : YES

VWEP Support            : HELL YEAH!


* Construction *

Poly Count              : 665 tris.md2 

Vert Count              : 342 tris.md2 

Skin Count              : 2 DM, 2 CTF

Base		        : Sydney

Editor used             : 
		Modeling - lightwave	
		Animation- lightwave + puppetmaster
		Skining  - Q2modeler, NST
		Painting - Photoshop, NST
		
Known Bugs              : None that i know of.

Feel free to edit my model as you see fit, just be sure to mention me
in the readme file. This model is not to be distributed as part of any
commercial product.
